pages.text: Sometimes one craves something mad, something that tears and carries away far beyond. Mandrake and Pufferfish Stew is a wild dish, plunging the consumer into a true whirlpool of thoughts and feelings. For several minutes, the head spins, but the body is fortified, and the blood races through the veins. The stew dizzies the mind and significantly enhances resistance to damage.

pages.title: Creation
pages.text: Mandrake Stew is the main delicacy for warriors who honor the berserker's combat art before the upcoming battle.
